This is a decent sweater. I don’t think the quality is as high as I expected. But the major issue is that mine came NIB but had piling under the arms and smelled of perfume. I suspect I received something worn and returned. I’m petite (5’1 and 118) and it also doesn’t fit as large as others reviewed. I wonder if it had also been washed/dried (I would only ever hang dry a sweater like this). I like the sweater but I’ll be returning and possibly repurchasing.

Paired with leggings and covers just enough to be conservative yet flattering.  For reference I'm 5,2 about 136 lbs 34DD.

I actually do like the sweater, the material is super soft, not at all scratchy. I ordered one size larger, Yes I wanted an off the shoulder oversized sweater-  plus reading the reviews, seemed like it ran small. I wanted to make sure I could wear it off the shoulder. Even though it fits and looks fine in the body/torso… Oh but I cannot wear it off 2 shoulders, Metal It just slips back up not exactly what I was looking for. I would have to order two sizes bigger than what I wanted to get look in the picture shown. I’m gonna keep it. I’ll just have to wear it a little differently than planned, I would definitely order one to two sizes bigger if i wanted it oversized. I’m a true medium . I ordered a large. That being said, it’s very soft good quality the neck will look a little odd if you don’t wear it off the shoulders, but you can work with it. 评论概述: Super Soft! Loose and Comfortable ( I ordered Up on Purpose )
评论详情: I ordered this off the shoulder sweater in the Apricot color, as a size extra large. I typically wear a large, but I'm 8 months along and usually prefer my clothes a size up anyway for comfort so I opted for the extra large. When I say this is now the softest sweater I own, I mean it. I really like the way it's not restrictive of my wrists nor tight around the waist line, so I am able to french tuck it with jeans, or let it hang over the top of my leggings! It looks just as it does in the product images, in both appearance and color - and the better than expected feel of the material, really put this on a pedestal for me. I would definitely recommend it, and I'm not one to normally splurge more than about 30 for a good sweater, but this one seems worth it in my opinion.
Lovely sweater, very soft and cozy! I love the coffee color. Fit is great and exactly as expected. This brand is typically very consistent in the high quality. Definitely recommend
I got this sweater for $18 off the old price. In total I spent $20... this sweater is very cute but not worth 42!! lol they are crazy
I think this may be one of my favorite Amazon finds yet!! From the fit, to the quality, to the shape!! Just perfect. This is a MUST HAVE for the fall and winter
Great fit, TTS
So soft comfy and cute! Slightly expensive for the quality of the top but the way it fits is worth it to buy!

评论概述: Soft, warm, definitely meant for cooler weather
评论详情: I am aware that most sweaters are intended for cold weather, but I like the baggy, airy appearance even through the warmer season.  I’ve had off the shoulder sweaters of similar presence that were great for warm weather, but despite the photo showing this paired with shorts/skirt - it’s definitely meant for warmer weather and not a breathable fabric.  Nonetheless, fabric is soft and appears to be durable. Keeping for the colder months.
Tried on the black one and it was not soft to the touch and felt rough on my skin.  Went back immediately. Feels cheap.
This sweater is super soft. Very trendy. Love the look and feel. Fits as expected.

评论概述: Great quality but I don't love the design..
评论详情: I love an oversized sweater more than anything. This one is great quality and looks expensive however, the fold down part is not practical. It kept unfolding and I had to keep fidgeting with it all day when I wore it.

I LOVE sweaters! When I saw this I had to have it! It is soft and warm, just perfect for winter weather especially date night! My intention is to pair this over a strapless black dress with some tall black boots. Dressing it down with some jeans and boots would make it perfect for a blustery winter day. For reference I am six feet tall, weigh about 190, am a 36DD and ordered an XL in coffee. I ADORE the color, it is perfect for fall and winter, it is flattering to my dark auburn hair. The sleeves are long enough for my long arms, even if I do not bring the shoulders down. It is a little oversized on me, and I should have ordered down a size, as I feel it is a bit oversized on my frame. Take caution when ordering, as if you want oversized order up. For me, I can't wait for cooler weather to wear this gem! Highly recommend this gorgeous sweater to anyone needing something cozy and cute for colder weather!
This is a beautiful semi light weight sweater. The material is so soft, I ordered a size bigger just for the oversized loose look, and it's perfect. Great quality and not a bad price!

I was very pleasantly surprised how soft this sweater is. I ordered the coffee color and it looks about like it does in the picture.  I got the xl, and typically wear a size 16, this fits very nicely. It does pull down off the shoulders but maybe not quite as far as in the picture.  I really like this. I think it will look good with jeans or leggings and I look forward to wearing this when it's not over 100 degrees.

This is going to be an at home sweater for me just because I find that the off-shoulder look isn’t something I’m comfortable with.  I tried this on and even during that process I just found that my shoulders get too cold and then all of me is cold and that’s not what I’m looking for during sweater weather seasons.  I’d end up having to wear something underneath it to be warm enough so then it just looks silly.  I don’t mind looking silly at home but that’s not the look I am going for when I go out for an afternoon or evening.The fit seems true to size and is roomy and comfy.  The thickness is nice and it is soft though I may need a thin layer underneath to prevent the itch factor.

I love this sweater! It’s super soft and the material feels good quality and weight. It is true to size and fits loose like I was expecting. However, it has a band on the bottom of it so if I want to, I can tuck the band under and have the sweater sit more at my hips, which I appreciate because sometimes I don’t want to cover my bum! It feels like it would keep me warm but isn’t overly heavy. The white is a pretty soft tone and I can wear it off both shoulders without it riding back up. Really happy with this one!
